summary: Completed comprehensive testing of IT Inventory System new features. All major features working: Equipment with tabs (General/Hardware/Software/Credenciales), Maintenance with preventive/corrective specific fields, Invoices with CFDI Mexico format, Quotations with RFC and regimen fiscal.

minor.issue: Intermittent 520 Cloudflare timeout error (transient, works on retry)

passed_tests: Equipment form with 4 tabs: General, Hardware, Software, Credenciales
Equipment Hardware tab: Processor (brand, model, speed), RAM (capacity, type), Storage (type, capacity), Network (IP, MAC)
Equipment Software tab: OS (name, version, license), Antivirus (name, license, expiry)
Equipment Credentials tab: Windows (user, password), Email (account, password), Cloud (user, password)
Maintenance form with Preventivo specific fields (next_maintenance_date, frequency)
Maintenance form with Correctivo specific fields (diagnosis, solution, repair_time)
Maintenance history PDF download per equipment
Invoice form with CFDI tabs: Receptor, CFDI, Conceptos, Notas
Invoice CFDI fields: uso_cfdi, metodo_pago, forma_pago, moneda
Invoice Receptor fields: RFC, regimen_fiscal, codigo_postal
Quotation form with RFC del Cliente and RÃ©gimen Fiscal fields
Quotation Details tab with Uso CFDI field
API: Equipment CRUD with hardware/software/credential fields
API: Maintenance CRUD with preventive/corrective fields
API: Invoice CRUD with CFDI fields
API: Quotation CRUD with RFC and regimen fiscal
updated_files: /app/frontend/src/lib/api.js - Added approve, reject, markPaid, getPdf methods
/app/backend/tests/test_new_features.py - New test file for all features
seed_data_creation: Created test equipment with hardware/software/credentials, maintenance logs with preventive/corrective fields, invoices with CFDI data, quotations with RFC
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features implemented and tested: 1) Equipment form now has 4 tabs (General, Hardware, Software, Credenciales) with detailed fields for processor, RAM, storage, network, OS, antivirus, and credentials. 2) Maintenance form shows specific fields based on type - Preventivo shows next_maintenance_date and frequency, Correctivo shows diagnosis, solution, and repair_time. 3) Invoices use CFDI Mexico format with uso_cfdi, metodo_pago, forma_pago, moneda, and client RFC/regimen_fiscal. 4) Quotations include client RFC and regimen_fiscal fields. NO PAC integration for CFDI timbrado (noted as pending).
notes: PAC integration for CFDI timbrado is NOT implemented (noted as pending in the app). The invoice form shows a warning about this.
